title: Enhancing perovskite solar cell efficiency and stability through the incorporation of BDAI2 and DMPDAI2
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, 3,552-557
DOI: 10.1039/D3YA00496A, Communication
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Han Wen Chang, Chien Cheng Li, Tzu Yu Haung, Hsin Chieh Li, Chih Shan Tan
This research explores the incorporation of 2D materials, BDAI2 and DMPDAI2, into perovskite solar cells, demonstrating enhanced efficiency and stability in the resulting devices.
